title: How They Stole the Game: The Book FIFA Tried to Ban
description:
How They Stole the Game: The Book FIFA Tried to Ban, 2011 edition - David Yallop [epub]

What's wrong with Football today? In June 2011, Sepp Blatter was elected - uncontested - as president of Fifa once more. Despite attempts to halt the vote amidst allegations and accusations of corruption, the show went on.

As David Yallop's classic exposÃ© of the dark heart behind the beautiful game showed when it was first published, Football was rotten from the top down. In the book Yallop reveals the story of JoÃ£o Havelenge, Fifa President from 1974 to 1998, the Godfather of football, and how he turned a religion to millions of fans into a multi-billion dollar business, riven with suspicious deals and unexpected payments
